Title: A Practical Handbook for the Actor
Notes: EBOOKS ENCOURAGED, TEXTBOOK AVAILABLE IN CLASS
Athletic attire is required.  The attire does not need to be school uniform, but it must comply with the dress code: no tank tops, shorts must be an appropriate length.

Uniform is provided by the school, billed through finance.  Athletic shoes are required to be worn in class. Street and skate shoes are not allowed.  The sole of the shoe should be hard and should not bend/fold.  No textbook is required.
